example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2Address -AllocationId eipalloc-12345678
AllocationId : eipalloc-12345678 AssociationId : eipassoc-12345678 Domain : vpc InstanceId : i-87654321 NetworkInterfaceId : eni-12345678 NetworkInterfaceOwnerId : 12345678 PrivateIpAddress : 10.0.2.172 PublicIp : 198.51.100.2
example.description: This example describes the specified Elastic IP address for instances in EC2-Classic.
This example describes your Elastic IP addresses for instances in a VPC. This syntax requires PowerShell version 3 or later.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2Address -PublicIp 203.0.113.17
AllocationId : AssociationId : Domain : standard InstanceId : i-12345678 NetworkInterfaceId : NetworkInterfaceOwnerId : PrivateIpAddress : PublicIp : 203.0.113.17
example.description: This example describes the specified Elastic IP address for instances in EC2-Classic.
This example describes your Elastic IP addresses for instances in EC2-Classic. This syntax requires PowerShell version 3 or later.
This example describes all your Elastic IP addresses.
